Util

Class MutationHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • Util.MutationHelpers

  • public final class MutationHelpers
extends Object
    The MutationHelpers class provides helper functions for collecting nodes and types of the given AST program.

      • getMethodParams

        public static List<String> getMethodParams(com.github.javaparser.resolution.declarations.ResolvedMethodDeclaration method)
        The type parameters of a Method are returned.
        Parameters:
        method - The MethodDeclaration for the method we want the parameters for
        Returns:
        A List of Strings containing the String type of each parameter in the method declaration

        The type parameters of a Constructor are returned.
        Parameters:
        constructor - The ResolvedConstructorDeclaration for the constructor we want the parameters for
        Returns:

      • compareLineNumbers

        public static boolean compareLineNumbers(Optional<com.github.javaparser.Position> position,
                                         Optional<com.github.javaparser.Position> nodeDeclarationPosition)
        Determines if a node is above or below another node to restrict the amount of nodes that are returned.
        Parameters:
        position - A position object that holds the line number for the node we are trying to collect
        nodeDeclarationPosition - A position object that holds the line number for the fixed node we are comparing against
        Returns:
        A boolean type, true if the node we are interested occurs before the other; false otherwise

      • getRequiredTypes

        public static com.github.javaparser.ast.NodeList<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> getRequiredTypes(com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                                             List<String> params)
        Given a list of parameters find replacements for these parameters of the same type. Given a node that represents the node in the AST program find expressions in the local scope that are acceptable.
        Parameters:
        node - The chosen node that we need to use for line checking
        params - A list of types as Strings that we need to find replacement expressions for
        Returns:
        A nodelist of expressions with the same length as the params list

      • methodImplemented

        public static boolean methodImplemented(com.github.javaparser.ast.body.MethodDeclaration md)
        Ensure that the method declaration chosen has been implemented, checking interfaces and abstract classes for static methods.
        Parameters:
        md - The method declaration that we are trying to determine if it has been implemented or not
        Returns:
        A boolean type determining if the method has been implemented or not

      • resolveCollection

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> resolveCollection(com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                String resolvedType)
        Resolve all nodes of a certain type in the local and global scope of a given node. Local scope checks the current class and field declaration. While the global scope checks for method declarations, object creation expressions and field access expressions in other methods and classes.
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine a list of expressions for in the local and global scope
        resolvedType - A String type for the expressions in scope we are trying to collect
        Returns:
        A list of expressions of the required type that where found in the local and global scope of a given node

      • reflectionConstructorResolving

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> reflectionConstructorResolving(com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                             com.github.javaparser.resolution.declarations.ResolvedReferenceTypeDeclaration resolvedReferenceTypeDeclaration)
        Reflection type solving can determine classes to that belong to default packages belonging to Java such as; Java.lang or Java.util, in this instance constructors are accessed in this way.
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine local types for in scope
        resolvedReferenceTypeDeclaration - The constructor type
        Returns:

      • resolveLocalTypes

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> resolveLocalTypes(com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                String resolvedType)
        Resolve all expressions in the local scope of a given node including; - Enum declarations in the program - Field variables in the class - Method call expressions, Variable declarations, Object creation expressions and Field access expressions in the method - Method parameters of the method the node belongs to if applicable
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine a list of expressions for in the local and global scope
        resolvedType - A String type for the expressions in scope we are trying to collect
        Returns:
        A list of expressions of the required type that where found in the local scope of a given node

      • resolveMethodDeclarations

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> resolveMethodDeclarations(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu,
                                                                                        com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                        String resolvedType)
        Resolve all method declarations in the program that new parameters of the same type can be generated for. Method declarations must be implementable and accessible for them to be considered. Methods in the same method and classes are considered as well as static methods and methods in other classes.
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine a list of expressions for based on the method declarations in the program
        resolvedType - A String type for the expressions in scope we are trying to collect
        Returns:
        A list of expressions of the required type that could be resolved in scope of the given node

      • resolveObjectCreationExpr

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> resolveObjectCreationExpr(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu,
                                                                                        com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                        String className)
        For a given class try and create all overloaded constructors filling in the parameters as required. If no valid constructor exists for the class then the default constructor is used instead.
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine a list of object creation expressions for
        className - The name of the class we are trying to find overloaded constructors for
        Returns:
        A list of expressions that contain each resolved constructor for the given className

      • resolveFieldAccessExpr

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> resolveFieldAccessExpr(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu,
                                                                                     com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node,
                                                                                     String resolvedType)
        Resolve all field access expressions in the program.
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine a list of expressions for based on the field access expressions in the program
        resolvedType - A String type for the expressions in scope we are trying to collect
        Returns:
        A list of expressions for field access expressions that could be in different classes and methods

      • resolveAllEnumDeclarations

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> resolveAllEnumDeclarations(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu,
                                                                                         String resolvedType)
        Parameters:
        cu -
        resolvedType -
        Returns:

      • resolveAllTypes

        public static HashMap<String,List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression>> resolveAllTypes(com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node)
        Get all the types in a given program and return them as a HashMap of a type to expressions.
        Parameters:
        node - The node we determine a list of expressions for based on the field access expressions in the program
        Returns:
        A HashMap of String types to a List of expressions that have that type

      • getChildrenOfExpression

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.Node> getChildrenOfExpression(com.github.javaparser.ast.Node node)
        Given a binary expression e.g. (x > 5 && y < 5) determine the child nodes of this, e.g. x > 5, y < 5. Child nodes can be enclosed in brackets e.g. (x > 5) or unary e.g. !(x > 5).
        Parameters:
        node - The node we wish to get the child nodes for, usually a binary expression is passed
        Returns:
        A list of nodes that when combined would create the parent node

      • collectStatementExpressions

        public static List<com.github.javaparser.ast.expr.Expression> collectStatementExpressions(com.github.javaparser.ast.CompilationUnit cu)
        Statement expressions are ones that occur in if statements, while statements etc... For this method only statements in if, while and for each statements, are collected as the expressions will be manipulated by various mutation operators.
        Parameters:
        cu - The AST representation of the program
        Returns:
        A list of expressions that represent the expression of a control statement
